sentences.english: The defenders were doing reasonably well until the attackers brought their tanks into play.
sentences.chinese: 知道进攻者出动坦克之前，防御者的阻击相当出色。

sentences.english: So far, governments have courageously fended off financial catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，各国政府都勇敢的阻击金融灾难。

sentences.english: Sniper will now join the fight.
sentences.chinese: 此时会有一名阻击手加入战斗。

sentences.english: He is already in death row in Virginia for a fatal snipper shooting there.
sentences.chinese: 他已因在维吉尼亚洲的一次致命的阻击被判死刑。

sentences.english: When a Sniper is killed, another will take his place shortly after.
sentences.chinese: 消灭阻击手后，其它阻击兵会补充他的位置。

sentences.english: First, don't relent on counter-terrorism. Al-Qaeda will need stopping for years to come.
sentences.chinese: 第一不要停止反恐，未来数年还需要阻击基地组织。

definition: to stop/to obstruct/to bar the way
to break a siege/to break out of an enclosure
to encircle and annihilate/refers to repeated campaigns of the Guomindang against the communists from 1930 onwards
to besiege/to beleaguer/to attack from all sides/to jointly speak or write against sb
to annihilate/to wipe out completely/to exterminate
to face an attack/to repulse the enemy
